title: This Is Home
posting_body: Luxury living awaits you at The Bridges at Germantown Apartments!

This 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment home features a gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and laminate faux wood floors that overlooks the living room with a fireplace.
You’ll love the abundance of closet space throughout the apartment home and private patio/balcony.
A pre-wired intrusion alarm and laundry room with full-size washer and dryer are included.
We’re pet friendly and we accept online payments & maintenance requests!
Our self-service car wash is for the exclusive use of our residents.
Our exemplary Germantown ISD schools are Riverdale Elementary & Middle School & Houston High School.

We’re located near the Medical Corridor, Saddle Creek Shopping Center, Shelby Farms Park, the Greenline Trail, Lichterman Nature Center, Germantown Country Club, Germantown Performing Arts Center GPAC, Germantown Community Theatre, Whole Foods…and more!
